package.name: rqt_smach
package.description: This is a smple rqt-based GUI for smach. It shows the state of hierarchical SMACH state machines. It can visualize the possible transitions between states, as well as the currently active state and the values of user data that is passed around between states. The smach viewer uses the SMACH debugging interface based on the smach messages to gather information from running state machines.
